overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
HEIC to JPG Converter is a free online tool that converts 'HEIC (.heic)' image format taken with iPhone or iPad to high-quality JPG format.
 Although HEIC is an image format optimized for Apple devices, it may not be viewable on Windows or some web services. With this tool, you can immediately handle your images as JPGs after conversion, making sharing and editing smoother. No software installation required - completely free and ready to use by anyone.

steps.title: Upload HEIC Images
steps.description: Drag and drop HEIC files taken with your iPhone, or upload them using the 'Choose Files' button.

steps.title: Automatic JPG Conversion
steps.description: The conversion process starts automatically after upload, generating JPG images with optimal quality.

steps.title: Download Converted Images
steps.description: After conversion is complete, click the 'Download' button to save your JPG images.

items.title: Easy Conversion of Apple's HEIC Images
items.description: While HEIC is the standard image format on the latest iOS and macOS devices, it can't be opened on Windows or some social media platforms. This tool seamlessly bridges that gap, allowing for JPG conversion with just a drag and drop.

items.title: Maintain Image Quality During Conversion
items.description: HEIC is known for high compression and high quality, and this tool converts to JPG format while minimizing quality loss. You can be confident about preserving the colors and details of your photos.

items.title: Completely Free, No Registration Required
items.description: No email registration or subscription is needed. The convenience of using it whenever you want is appealing. With minimal ads, your conversion work progresses smoothly.

items.title: Works on Both Smartphones and PCs
items.description: Running in a web browser, it's comfortably accessible from all devices, including iPhones, Android smartphones, Windows, and Mac. You can quickly convert even when you're on the go.

questions.question: Will the converted image size be larger?
questions.answer: JPG format tends to be slightly larger than HEIC, but we optimize the balance between file size and quality during processing.

questions.question: Can I upload directly from an iPhone?
questions.answer: Yes, you can easily upload and convert from browsers like Safari or Chrome.

questions.question: Why can't some HEIC files be converted?
questions.answer: Files that are corrupted or use special compression formats might not convert. Please try with another image.

questions.question: Can I convert multiple images at once?
questions.answer: Currently, we support converting one image at a time. We plan to support batch processing in the future.

questions.question: Are the files saved after conversion?
questions.answer: No, uploaded files are automatically deleted after a certain period and are not stored on our servers. Your privacy is assured.
